title: Short-Intensive Course for Developing Case-Based Clinical Reasoning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary medical terminology and job-related health management experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, emphasizing workplace relevance for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the clinical reasoning process in three stages (information gathering-analysis-decision) through real-case analysis
Learners can establish diagnostic hypotheses with 80% accuracy by connecting patient symptoms and background data in CBL (case-based learning) scenarios
Learners can write structured reports (diagnosis/rationale/plan) documenting clinical judgment rationale based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
